definition: an article made of bamboo strips/fence
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
fence (esp. of bamboo or wood railings)

sentences.english: Barbara brought with her extensive internal and external management experience.
sentences.chinese: 笆笆拉具有广泛的内部和外部管理经验。

sentences.english: Barbara's career transition approach motivated me to 'push the envelope'.
sentences.chinese: 笆笆拉的事业转型方案激励我直面难题。

sentences.english: I pulled off to the side to really admire the fence.
sentences.chinese: 我停在路边认真地欣赏这片围栏笆。

sentences.english: I met Barbara at a point of real crisis.
sentences.chinese: 我是在真正危机的状态下去找笆笆拉的。

definition: stone roller (for threshing grain, leveling ground etc)/Taiwan pr. [du2]
